    Method and Description

    Use RolesFinder.hasAnyRequiredRoles(List, Map) instead.

    Use RolesFinder.hasAnyRequiredRoles(List, Map) instead.

  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description

    Use JwksSignature(JwksSignatureConfiguration, JwkValidator) instead.
